entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
